Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it's a great investment for anyone looking to enhance their experience. I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $140. This is an opportunity to save $10 while enjoying all the benefits this product has to offer. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
